field.name: summary
field.value: Misleading validation error messages in english language

field.name: description
field.value:
IMHO (I'm not a native English speaker) following error messages are not quite correct
<data name="length_toolong" xml:space="preserve"> <value>Field must be less than {0} characters long</value> </data>
Implies < {0} characters, should be <= {0} characters.
<data name="length_tooshort" xml:space="preserve"> <value>Field must be more than {0} characters long</value> </data>
Implies > {0} characters, should be >= {0} characters.
Sorry that there is no patch already -- probably some ~native English speaking person could do that.
